## 1. Installation

```{r setup}
library(OxSR)
```

## 2. Use

```{r}
data(data_cary)

 data_clean <- clean_sheet_cary(data_cary, prefix = "x")
```


```{r}
relation_hm_gt(data_clean[,1:3])
```


```{r}
# With plot
 relation_hm_gt(data_clean[,1:2], plot = F) |> 
  dplyr::mutate(across(2:7, ~ formatC(.x, format = "e", digits = 2)))

```

## With ggplot2

```{r}
relation_hm_gt(data_clean[,1:2], plot = TRUE)


```
